title: Fullstack software engineer
desc1: Hey! I'm a Brazilian who is passionate about building high-impact, well-performing user experiences.
desc2: I believe that work is a big portion of my day, so I try to make the best out of it for me and my colleagues.
desc3: To achieve that I focus on empathy during conversations and try to deliver something I'm happy with.
howConfortable: How confortable I'm with each technology
nonExhaustive: Non-exhaustive list of languages, technologies and tools
basedonCEFR: Based on CEFR language proficiency levels

whatsetsmeapart.title: What sets me apart?
whatsetsmeapart.reason1: I demonstrate strong performance so colleagues can rely upon me.
whatsetsmeapart.reason2: I'm self-motivated with a passion for learning and using both front and back-end technologies.
whatsetsmeapart.reason3: I'm a systems thinker who can reason through systems and understand technical tradeoffs.

workexp.notlisted: There is two freelance working experiences that are not listed.

lucalto.name: Lucalto
lucalto.desc: A Norwegian based company that provides consulting services in web technologies.
lucalto.highlight1: I developed my skills in a production environment, using next.js and typescript
lucalto.highlight2: I honed my skills in independent problem-solving and information retrieval

switchApp.name: Switch App
switchApp.desc: Switch is a service contracting platform for Bars, Restaurants, Hotels and other establishments.
switchApp.highlight2: I significantly improved the accessibility of your system, e.g. responsiveness, UX, loading
switchApp.highlight3: Contributed significantly to the discussion of ideas in daily meetings

speedCast.name: Speedcast
speedCast.desc: Speedcast is a company specializing in communications satellite technology.
speedCast.highlight1: I converted large amounts of data into Excel (csv and xlsx)
speedCast.highlight2: I was part of a global and multicultural team
speedCast.highlight3: Built the UI and UX from scratch for the company's new platform
speedCast.highlight4: Worked with several frameworks, such as react and Vue.js

alex.desc: Speedcast is a company specializing in communications satellite technology.
alex.highlight1: Maintainance and migration of a legacy create-react-app system to Next.js
alex.highlight2: Implemented translations with a compatibility layer between CRA and Next.js
alex.highlight3: Resolves performance and setup E2e, unit, snapshot tests
alex.highlight4: Configured, centralized and managed the sending of emails
